props.name: ghost
props.docs: Ghost breadcrumbs will not show solid backgrounds on individual crumbs unless there is a mouse event (e.g. hover)

props.name: nextItems
props.docs: Items will be accessible through a dropdown

props.name: visibleItemCount
props.docs: Excess items will get hidden inside of dropdown

props.name: icon
props.docs: Icon to be displayed next ot the label

props.name: ghost
props.docs: Button with no background or outline

props.name: selected
props.docs: Show button as selected. Should be used with outline or invisible

props.name: categories
props.docs:
Configuration object hash used to populate the dropwdown menu for typeahead and quick selection functionality.
Each ID maps to an object with a label and an array of options to select from.

props.name: filterState
props.docs: A set of search criteria to populate the component with.

props.name: hideIcon
props.docs:
Allows to hide the icon inside the text input.
Defaults to false

props.name: icon
props.docs:
The icon next to the actual text input
Defaults to 'search'

props.name: initialState
props.docs:
When set this will initially populate the component with the provided search criteria.
This will trigger all input events accordingly.

docsTags.name: deprecated
docsTags.text: will get removed with next major release (7.0.0). Use the member filterState instead.

props.deprecation: will get removed with next major release (7.0.0). Use the member filterState instead.

props.name: nonSelectableCategories
props.docs:
In certain use cases some categories are not available for selection any more.
To allow proper display of set filters with these categories this ID to label mapping can be populated.
Configuration object hash used to supply labels to the filter chips in the input field.
Each ID maps to a string representing the label to display.

props.name: placeholder
props.docs: Placeholder text to be displayed in an empty input field.

props.name: repeatCategories
props.docs:
If set to true allows that a single category can be set more than once.
An already set category will not appear in the category dropdown if set to false.

Defaults to true

props.name: suggestions
props.docs: A list of strings that will be supplied as typeahead suggestions not tied to any categories.

events.docs: Event dispatched whenever the filter state changes.
Event dispatched whenever the text input changes.

props.name: active
props.docs: Display chip in active state. Only working witht `variant="primary"`

props.name: background
props.docs: Custom color for pill. Only working for `variant='custom'`

props.name: color
props.docs: Custom font color for pill. Only working for `variant='custom'`

events.docs: Fire event if close button is clicked

props.name: background
props.docs: Custom color for pill. Only working for `variant='custom'`

props.name: color
props.docs: Custom font color for pill. Only working for `variant='custom'`

props.name: closeOnClickOutside
props.docs: Fired in case of an outside click during drawer showed state

props.name: fullHeight
props.docs: Render the drawer with maximum height

props.name: width
props.docs: Width interpreted as REM if not set to 'auto'

methods.name: toggleDrawer
methods.docs: Toggle or define show state of drawer

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: show Overwrite toggle state with boolean

events.docs: Fire event after drawer is close
Fire event after drawer is open

props.name: adjustDropdownWidthToReferenceWidth
props.docs: Adjust dropdown width to the parent width

props.name: adjustDropdownWidthToReferenceWith
props.docs: Adjust dropdown width to the parent width

docsTags.name: deprecated
docsTags.text: - property has a typo and will get removed in the next major version. Use `adjustDropdownWidthToReferenceWidth` instead.

props.deprecation: - property has a typo and will get removed in the next major version. Use `adjustDropdownWidthToReferenceWidth` instead.

props.name: header
props.docs: An optional header shown at the top of the dropdown

props.name: trigger
props.docs:
Define an element that triggers the dropdown.
A trigger can either be a string that will be interprated as id attribute or a DOM element.

events.docs: Fire event after visibility of dropdown has changed

props.name: checked
props.docs: Whether the item is checked or not. If true a checkmark will mark the item as checked.

props.name: disabled
props.docs: Disable item and remove event listeners

props.name: animated
props.docs: Animate state change transitions. Defaults to 'true'.

props.name: chevron
props.docs: Display a chevron icon in list items. Defaults to 'false'

props.name: itemHeight
props.docs:
Determines the height of list items.
This can either be one of two predefined sizes ('S' or 'L') or an absolute pixel value.
In case a number is supplied it will get converted to rem internally.
Defaults to 'S'.

props.name: chevron
props.docs: Show chevron on right side of the event list item

props.name: color
props.docs:
Color of the status indicator.
Allowed values are all Core UI color names.

props.name: opacity
props.docs:
Opacity of the status indicator.
Defaults to 1.0

docsTags.name: deprecated
docsTags.text: Will be removed in 7.0.0. Use color with alpha value.

props.deprecation: Will be removed in 7.0.0. Use color with alpha value.

props.name: selected
props.docs: Show event list item as selected

props.name: disabled
props.docs: If true the filter chip will be in disabled state

props.name: collapsed
props.docs: Whether the group is collapsed or expanded. Defaults to true.

props.name: expandOnHeaderClick
props.docs: Expand the group if the header is clicked

props.name: index
props.docs:
The index of the selected group entry.
If undefined no group item is selected.

events.docs: Emits when whole group gets selected.
Emits when group item gets selected.

props.name: focusable
props.docs:
The elements tabindex attribute will get set accordingly.
If true tabindex will be 0, -1 otherwise.

props.name: suppressSelection
props.docs: Supress the selection of the group

props.name: name
props.docs: Use one of our defined icon names e.g `copy`.

props.name: selected
props.docs: Selected state only working with outline or invisible

props.name: hideContextMenu
props.docs: Hide the sidebar context menu button when set to true

props.docs:
Maximum number of menu items to show in case enough vertical space is available.
Extra menu items will be collapsed to 'show more' menu item.

props.docs: Should only be set if you use ix-menu standalone

props.docs: Disable tab and remove event handlers

props.docs: Move the Tab to a top position.

props.name: dismissible
props.docs: If true, close button is enabled and alert can be dismissed by the user

props.name: type
props.docs: Specifies the type of the alert.

events.docs: An event emitted when the close button is clicked

props.name: backdrop
props.docs:
Adds a dimming layer to the modal.
This should only be used when it it necessary to focus the user's attention to the dialog content (e.g. errors, warnings, complex tasks).

props.docs: Optional icon displayed next to the title

props.docs: Custom color for pill. Only working for `variant='custom'`

props.docs: Custom font color for pill. Only working for `variant='custom'`

props.name: disabled
props.docs: If true the select will be in disabled state

props.docs: Input field placeholder for editable select

props.docs: If true the select will be in readonly mode

props.docs: Set tab items to small size

props.docs: Size of the tile - one of 'small', 'medium' or 'large'

props.name: accept
props.docs:
The accept attribute specifies the types of files that the server accepts (that can be submitted through a file upload).
[accept]{@link https ://www.w3schools.com/tags/att_input_accept.asp}

props.name: loadingText
props.docs: Will be used by state = UploadFileState.LOADING

props.name: multiple
props.docs: If multiple is true the user can drop or select multiple files

props.name: selectFileText
props.docs: Will be used by state = UploadFileState.SELECT_FILE

props.name: state
props.docs: After a file is uploaded you can set the upload component to a defined state

props.name: uploadFailedText
props.docs: Will be used by state = UploadFileState.UPLOAD_FAILED
